Body:
I have a nodemcu module. I set the gpio 12 as output pin and analogwrite(1023)

When I was working with my circuit, this pin connected to te 5 volt (positive voltage)

Suddenly the LED_BUTTON turned on and the module stop working. I can upload code to module correctly and there is no problem but I can can upload code to module. The module doesn't work and it gets very hot. When I connect module to the usb, the LED_BUTTON turns on for a short time and then turns off again.

Is my module burned? Can I fix it ?
